column1: Little Goat Diner////Best brunch I've ever had. Little Goat knows how to bring big
column2: punchy flavor that is plated with finesse. Â We had "This little piggy went to China" as well as a daily special that was a mole quesadilla made with Bourbon County Brand Stout. Both were phenomenal with hearty portions. We had the pork belly potatoes as well
column3: and it was plenty to share. Service was perfect. Will definitely be back!
